channel.title: This Song Is Bound To Give You Goosebumps
channel.description:
Hey. This is the '[i]This[/i] Song Is Bound To Give You Goosebumps.' thread. It's pretty clear, post a song that makes the hairs stand up on your neck, that makes you shiver or gives you 'goosebumps'.
Here's one I'd remembered from the 300 soundtrack, it's amazing: http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=WSu9T0f6q3Y
The first 30 seconds or so are just magnificent. God, those choir-like voices always get me. Especially when they're played during battle scenes or during betrayel, death and the like.

I Br3ndan I:

It doesn’t quite have the effect I was talking about on me, but then again it may be personal to you, meaningful, representing, or whatever.

Yeah, the video you posted definitely has that effect on me, this one is more personal.

item.title: This Song Is Bound To Give You Goosebumps
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Punch Me I Bleed by Children of Bodom

From the reign I’ve built
Of shame and guilt
I go back and take a look
At myself and what
I have done so far
At the bridge he’s
Dying waiting till light

No choice to go
Backward, it was
Okay, to us
youre to cold to swing by

Going down I walk my way to hell
deep to the obscurity
Obliterating you in every way
With my life’s insanity

Battered up again
I’m going all insane
Curled up on the floor
Wonder ways to kill the pain and
What doesn’t kill you
Only makes you pissed off

Sweep back to kill
The Pain, make it go away
So long to pack your shot at me
Just when you punch me, I bleed

Going down I walk, my way to hell
Deep to the obscurity
Obliterating you in every way
With my life’s insanity

[Solo]

No choice to go
Backwards, it was
Okay, to us
You’re to cold to swing by

Going down I walk my way to hell
Deep to the obscurity
Obliterating you in every way
With my life’s insanity

Also:http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=wwH2bzrdLdc

Read full topic
item.source: This Song Is Bound To Give You Goosebumps
